title: Representations - Limits with Tables and Graphs

content.question: The graph of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is shown above. Which of the following could be a table of values for <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="The figure presents a 2 row table, with 5 columns of data. The heading for row 1 is “x,” and the heading for row 2 is “f of x.” The data in the table are as follows. Column 1. x is 0.95. f of x is 6.9025. Column 2. x is 0.99. f of x is 6.9801. Column 3. x is 1. f of x is 7. Column 4. x is 1.001. f of x is 7.0020. Column 5. x is 1.05. f of x is 7.1025." overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnlines="solid" columnspacing="0.0em" columnwidth="3em 0.05em 4em 4em 3em 4em 4em " equalrows="true" frame="solid" framespacing="0.0em 0.5ex" rowlines="solid" rowspacing="1ex" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mrow><mn>0.95</mn></mrow></mtd><mtd><mn>0.99</mn></mtd><mtd><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mtd><mtd><mn>1.001</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1.05</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mn>6.9025</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6.9801</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7.0020</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7.1025</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
